casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Travis Taylor DAIL. No. 174P16-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 11, 2016. Robert O'Hale, for Dail, Travis Taylor. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. J. Douglas Henderson, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

*95The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th of May 2016 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th of May 2016."
